dict.acceptation: 倾听；留心听；听信；（让对方注意）听着；

sent.orig: SILENT is an anagram of LISTEN.
sent.trans: SILENT就是组成LISTEN的字母颠倒顺序后构成的字。

sent.orig: Listen to people. Listen to their stories. Listen deeply. That's how you learn things.
sent.trans: 倾听别人的倾诉。倾听他们的故事。用心去倾听。这是你学习事物的方法。

sent.orig: People still listen to blues and rock, but they also listen to hip?hop and rap.
sent.trans: 人们仍然听布鲁斯和摇滚，但他们也听街舞音乐和说唱乐。
啊，听吧，听吧，快乐的太太们。

sent.orig: Listen and practice. Note the sounds. Listen for the difference.
sent.trans: 听一听，练一练。注意语音。找出不同的地方。
